entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent dotnet build behaviour between configurations #45200
  • [Aspire] dotnet watch does not refresh browser after rude edit & restart #45197
  • Remove support for DotNetCliToolReference #45193
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch crashes upon adding static files #45183
  • After migrating from .NET 8 to .NET 9, the application crashes when I send a request to the CoreWCF server from a .NET 9 client application. #45182
  • enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_ProjectType and revert framework targetting #45181
  • [BUG] . NET9.0 Blazor Web App cannot allow cross domain websites to display nested iframe tags #45172

Closed

  • Get process ID of a .NET Core process through .NET CLI #19193
    Backlog
  • Collection was modified in SdkResolverService.ResolveSdkUsingResolversWithPatternsFirst #45168

PullRequests

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.SolutionPersistence: 1.0.23 -> 1.0.26 #45199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Set outputParentDirectory for 1ES outputs #45198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump darc #45186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45171
    untriaged
  • Wait for project changes when unchanged project doesn't build #45167
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix TargetRid for Mono CrossAOT Alpine arm64 build #45194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #45120
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • VMR: Move Final Join job into vmr-build.yml and only run it if vertical build passed #45178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding Microsoft.Testing.Platform dependencies #45180
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix win-x86 windowsdesktop and aspnetcore builds #45162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add verticals for Linux/Windows NativeAOT runtime packs #45154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-Templates
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2590512 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
